Description.val: Program provides for procurement of spares to support initial fielding of new or modified end items.

Justification.val: FY 2018 Base procurement funding in the amount of $38.269 million procures Depot Level Reparable (DLR) secondary items from the Supply Management, Army activity of the Army Working Capital Fund.  To provide initial support, funds are normally required in the same year that end items are fielded.
